name: B-312
description:
Our character, who is tired of life and doesn't leave his home much, comes across a news while watching television. Presenter said in the news that volunteers are needed for the experiment to be carried out. Our character thinks he has nothing to lose and goes to the facility where the experiment will take place. The attendant is told that his number is B-312. When he enters the experimental room, he sees the other subjects getting worse and worse. It says "I only live once." and he starts running. But when he ran away, he didn't know he was actually in the real experiment.

We don't use ready assets!

(We can't finish the game. But we believe this jam has improved us.(

Ata Onur Uysal - Artist

Yusuf Yazıcı - Coder

Alp Arcan - Artist
